医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UKHSA 向 CARPHA 捐赠先进的基因组监测设备这是加强全球基因组监测以追踪大流行和潜在流行的新变异和病原体的重大一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/UKHSA-donates-advanced-genomic-surveillance-equipment-to-CARPHA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/UKHSA-donates-advanced-genomic-surveillance-equipment-to-CARPHA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c1c5b44-7b1c-44ee-bfd3-21cea71bffb6 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:45:00 -0400 UKHSA donates advanced genomic surveillance equipment to CARPHA
种族歧视与青少年不健康的皮质醇模式相关科学家们已经知道，种族歧视造成的压力与许多慢性健康状况有关，但对于哪种类型的歧视危害最大却知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Racial-discrimination-linked-with-unhealthy-cortisol-patterns-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Racial-discrimination-linked-with-unhealthy-cortisol-patterns-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba540e99-188e-4992-8379-948956d15ae7 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:30:00 -0400 Racial discrimination associated with unhealthy cortisol patterns in adolescents
KFF 健康新闻“健康是什么？”：医疗补助更加混乱在错误的计算机程序错误地确定他们不再符合资格后，联邦官员已指示至少 30 个州恢复医疗补助和儿童健康保险计划，覆盖 50 万人，其中包括儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-More-Medicaid-messiness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-More-Medicaid-messiness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f629db43-6f19-4b24-9dcb-90e080e1688f Wed, 27 Sep 2023 16:22:58 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': More Medicaid messiness
随着新冠感染人数的增加，疗养院仍在等待疫苗70 岁的退休按摩治疗师黛布·威提克 (Deb Wityk) 住在爱荷华州乡村的一家名为司布真庄园 (Spurgeon Manor) 的疗养院里，她说：“新冠病毒在疗养院里的日子可不好过。”她曾两次感染这种疾病，她渴望获得新批准的疫苗，因为她患有慢性淋巴细胞白血病，这削弱了她的免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/As-covid-infections-rise-nursing-homes-are-still-waiting-for-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/As-covid-infections-rise-nursing-homes-are-still-waiting-for-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70e7e140-467f-4c3d-9e0a-6f6dbcfc698b Wed, 27 Sep 2023 15:41:59 -0400 As covid infections rise, nursing homes are still waiting for vaccines
人畜共患溢出防护：计算设计的抗原针对一系列冠状病毒研究人员采用结合系统发育学、3D 蛋白质模型和质粒设计的跨学科方法来识别和计算设计代表目前大多数已知 sarbecovirus 核心的抗原。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Zoonotic-spillover-safeguarding-computationally-Designed-antigen-targets-range-of-coronaviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Zoonotic-spillover-safeguarding-computationally-Designed-antigen-targets-range-of-coronaviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0014c84f-1adc-4661-868c-8c514c9d428b Wed, 27 Sep 2023 10:39:00 -0400 Zoonotic spillover safeguarding: computationally designed antigen targets range of coronaviruses
Panacol 用于医疗可穿戴设备的特殊粘合剂可穿戴患者监护设备直接佩戴在身体上，并且越来越多地使用https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Panacole28099s-Special-Adhesives-for-Medical-Wearables.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Panacole28099s-Special-Adhesives-for-Medical-Wearables.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f46bd68-578a-480e-8fd5-ced0469a0bc1 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 10:26:00 -0400 Panacol’s Special Adhesives for Medical Wearables
药物和突变：molnupiravir 对 SARS-CoV-2 基因组的影响研究人员在 SARS-CoV-2 基因组中发现了与 molnupiravir 相关的突变特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Meduction-and-mutations-molnupiravirs-impact-on-SARS-CoV-2-genomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Meduction-and-mutations-molnupiravirs-impact-on-SARS-CoV-2-genomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4803c71e-ba8a-4db7-9c95-f3e2ee765a51 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 10:03:00 -0400 Medication and mutations: molnupiravir's impact on SARS-CoV-2 genomes

如果联邦政府关闭，医疗计划会怎样？自 2019 年以来，国会的僵局将首次导致联邦政府的大部分部门至少暂时关闭，其中包括许多医疗项目。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/What-happens-to-health-programs-if-the-federal-government-shuts-down.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/What-happens-to-health-programs-if-the-federal-government-shuts-down.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=748e586d-79c3-473d-9973-888761d811b1 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 09:36:28 -0400 What happens to health programs if the federal government shuts down?
皮肤承受压力：紧张会影响皮肤对污染的反应研究人员证实了之前的研究结果，即臭氧 (O3)（一种空气污染物）暴露会改变皮肤中抗菌肽的表达，无论是否处于紧张状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Skin-under-Pressure-tension-affects-skins-reaction-to-pollution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Skin-under-Pressure-tension-affects-skins-reaction-to-pollution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e192d39-881b-4b7f-8349-47890b5cac41 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 08:57:00 -0400 Skin under pressure: tension affects skin's reaction to pollution
